summary: Since he was a child, Aladin Chatterjee has been teased for his fairytale name. As a college student he follows his namesake's footsteps; unleashing genie Genius and wooing exchange student Jasmine. But the evil Ringmaster approaches.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Sanjay Dutt|Riteish Deshmukh|Jacqueline Fernandez|Sahil Khan|Erina Andriana|Shubhankar Atre|Victor Banerjee|Dhaval Barbhaya|Michael Chen|Savanna Darnell|Master Ahan Desai|Boman Irani|Master Dev Kanatwala|Vineet Kapoor|Nawab Khan|William Ong|Himanshu Parekh|Dharminder Kumar Rajput|Bimal Ranjit Sarkar|Joy Sengupta|Ratna Pathak Shah|Siddharth Sharma|Aarti Singh|Ajay Singh|Madan Singh|Mita Vasisht|Peter Wong|Vinay Kumar Yadav|Arif Zakaria
title: Aladin
